item.title: Object Random Issue
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

if(objectID == 5162) { if(playerHasItem(995)) { int chance = misc.random(3);//25% chance they win int items = misc.random(1000000000); //up to 1 Billion coins deleteItem(995, 100000000); sM("You Gamble 100M."); setAnimation(894); lowGFX(247,0); } if (chance == 1) { addItem(995, items);//Adds the random coins } else if (chance != 1) { sendMessage("You lost, sorry"); } else sendMessage("You need 100 Million coins to gamble here."); }

Wrote it on the spot, you might need to fix some errors.

Read full topic

item.title: Object Random Issue
item.dc:creator: @Elven_Dremor Elven Dremor
item.description:
@Elven_Dremor wrote:

How can I make this chest randomly give a selection of items?

if(objectID == 5162) { if(playerHasItem(995)) { deleteItem(995, 100000000); sM("You Gamble 100M."); setAnimation(894); lowGFX(247,0); } else sM("You need 100m to Gamble on this Chest."); }

What do i do?

Read full topic
